Articles.Content: Floor 4326: you should really have a pressure suit by now, being 3 floors from 13km in the sky.

Floor 4327: a dressing room with pressure suits.

133809132023

new page!

Floor 4326: Antiemetic medicine, to keep your lunch inside next time.

Ninja'd.

Floor 4328: Still it.

Floor 4329: a confused person staring at confusion being confused by confusing confusion that confused the confusing confusion that is confused by confusingly confused floors

175709132023
Floor 4330: A closet full of Spiderman suits so everyone who is confused can point at someone and perform the related meme

Floor 4331: a canister. Unmarked. It has a valve. Do you turn said valve?

190109132023
Floor 4332: A big red button. The caption underneath says: If you didn't open the canister then you should probably push this.
Floor 4333: This floor is under construction.
Floor 4334: This floor is under instruction, from an expert on the behaviour patterns of productive floors.
Floor 4335: A monument to the first ever star to exist

Floor 4336: this floor contains an identical canister to the one located on floor 4331, only this one has a hose attached to the valve leading to the very next floor. I turn the valve allowing for the flow of of N2O into our next floor.

091909152023

its safe i promise
Floor 4337: You giggle and shoot up the stairs to the next floor in less than 5 seconds.

Floor 4338: a canister of silly string aimed at and being sprayed into our next floor up. Oh what a fun mess!

112609162023
Floor 4339: The string is going in to a loom where they are making clown outfits that are quite silly. You watch the process for awhile before heading up.

Floor 4340: It appears that this floor is some kind of space station. You venture to the bridge and find the telemetry computers showing a course to Saturn. More analyze shows that this ship will be exploring the Saturnian moons with its docked landing craft. The space station seems deserted, but after some time, a monolith-shaped robot appears, lumbering through the corridor as if doing a routine inspection. His name appears to be DONN, as evidenced by the text written on his 2nd rectangular segment.

He shows you to six cryogenic stasis pods. Each one is in use by an astronaut, deep in sleep as they await their arrival to Saturn.

Floor 4341: a food court. You see a korean restaurant, a japanese restaurant, a filipino restaurant, a hawaiian restaurant and an italian restaurant.

The smells of the various foods is intoxicatingly delicious.

112309172023
Floor 4342: A high court, it's by a floor higher.

Floor 4343: a texas gulf coast seafood place.

113909172023
Floor 4344: A box labeled "the best cuisine on Earth" as well as thousands of people arguing about what it is.

Floor 4345: a nonstop continuous loop of the barney song plays.

132209172023
Floor 4346: The room of Jeebs' shop where he keeps his junkyard neuralizer build which is free to use and can (yeah, right) help the minds that get broken on the previous floor.

Floor 4347: you see a wall with 2 things. 1 is a door, its a 1 way door. The other? A sign saying: Welcome to Escape From Floor 4347. You have survived 4346 floors. You have passed rigorous tests and trials and the first of 2 one way doors. You are trapped. The only way out is through. Good luck!

You bravely press on and enter a floor wide escape room. As you enter you notice it is a themed room. It is a Little Mermaid (90s animated) theme. You begin to walk forward and you hear it. The door slams shut behind you and a voice echoes out: To move up a floor you must escape. The fastest so far was 72 hours 35 minutes 45.5 seconds. The voice suddenly cackles with evil intent. The next thing it says, the music will not stop until you escape. The music then starts. You hear Frozen’s Let It Go starting a nonstop loop.

142809172023

Floor 4348:

One word

Floor 4349: a corridor that loops for 100 miles filled with 1 way doors every 10 feet. This corridor plays music. It has no harmony at all. Its nothing but discordant tones designed to drive you crazy in preparation for spooky season.

140009182023

Floor 4350: This is one of the backup control rooms, you decide to move the entire building to Dres. After some wheezing and groaning sounds you arrive. You find the lighter gravity helps you get to the next floor more easily.
